channel.title: How To make your exp slow down at level 100
channel.description:
alright i need my exp rate to slow down once you hit level 100 i'm using source of pmgz scape..ty
~~Pk

item.title: How To make your exp slow down at level 100
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

um ok, when you get to a higher level, you need more experience to level up, so you don’t really need to slow it down but if you want to still, try finding were it declares the exp received and add an if statement to it, like if combat level is >= 100 then it would give less exp per hit.

Read full topic
item.source: How To make your exp slow down at level 100
